item.title: Local Storage
item.description: Definition of Local Storage a browser API that allows a web application to persist its state inside a user’s web browser can be used to persist information retrieved from sources like user events, HTTP responses, and calculated results only persists strings has no expiration time until explicitly cleared improves a web application’s user experience more data can be stored in localStorage than in cookies Data model: the software representation of information Data persistence: store data in the application so that when a user comes back to the site, they can pick up from where they left off
